body_html:
I reproduced your setup with ubuntu, bazel 0.3.2 and bazel 0.4.1, and cuda 8.0
Tried to run the commands (without sudo) and for me everything ran successfully.

Please try running ./configure without sudo. In your current local repository it will fail, because there are now some files owned by the root, so I would suggest removing your folder with the code in it and checking the code out again.

As I tried with a few settings and could not reproduce the problem, I will now close the issue. If you still run into this issue please reopen.

As I tried with a few settings and could not reproduce the problem, I will now close the issue. If you still run into this issue please reopen.
body:
I reproduced your setup with ubuntu, bazel 0.3.2 and bazel 0.4.1, and cuda 8.0
Tried to run the commands (without `sudo`) and for me everything ran successfully.

Please try running `./configure` without sudo. In your current local repository it will fail, because there are now some files owned by the root, so I would suggest removing your folder with the code in it and checking the code out again.

As I tried with a few settings and could not reproduce the problem, I will now close the issue. If you still run into this issue please reopen.
